price: Haadhaafi abbaa isaatiifis tola oolaa ta’eera, Of tuulaa, dilaawaa hin taane.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
